StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: As you walk through the candy store, you come across a shelf that has a big bowl of taffy on one of the top shelves far higher than any child can reach. Curious, you take the jar down and examine the old-fashioned individually wrapped candies inside. As you rotate the jar you see a sticker with a warning label warning parents about the choking hazards of candy like this for extremely young children. There may not be any kids or babies in this town--for the best!--but you might benefit from a bit of motherly protection yourself...
StaticSkill.Description: Pregnant mommies need nice fitting panties like everyone else but some times it is hard to find some that fit just right, especially when you want one that has a soul attached so that they can rearrange and change shape as you progress.
